package cache

import (
	
	
	

	
)

var (
	cacheDuration     = 1 * time.Minute
	cleanTaskInterval = cacheDuration / 2

	lastClean                     time.Time
	skippedCleanWithCanvasRefresh = false

	// testing purpose only
	timeNow func() time.Time = time.Now
)

func () {
	if ,  := time.ParseDuration(os.Getenv("FYNE_CACHE"));  == nil {
		cacheDuration = 
		cleanTaskInterval = cacheDuration / 2
	}
}

// Clean run cache clean task, it should be called on paint events.
func ( bool) {
	 := timeNow()
	// do not run clean task too fast
	if .Sub(lastClean) < 10*time.Second {
		if  {
			skippedCleanWithCanvasRefresh = true
		}
		return
	}
	if skippedCleanWithCanvasRefresh {
		skippedCleanWithCanvasRefresh = false
		 = true
	}
	if ! && .Sub(lastClean) < cleanTaskInterval {
		return
	}
	destroyExpiredSvgs()
	destroyExpiredFontMetrics()
	if  {
		// Destroy renderers on canvas refresh to avoid flickering screen.
		destroyExpiredRenderers()
		// canvases cache should be invalidated only on canvas refresh, otherwise there wouldn't
		// be a way to recover them later
		destroyExpiredCanvases()
	}
	lastClean = timeNow()
}

// CleanCanvas performs a complete remove of all the objects that belong to the specified
// canvas. Usually used to free all objects from a closing windows.
func ( fyne.Canvas) {
	 := make([]fyne.CanvasObject, 0, 50)

	canvasesLock.RLock()
	for ,  := range canvases {
		if .canvas ==  {
			 = append(, )
		}
	}
	canvasesLock.RUnlock()
	if len() == 0 {
		return
	}

	canvasesLock.Lock()
	for ,  := range  {
		delete(canvases, )
	}
	canvasesLock.Unlock()

	renderersLock.Lock()
	for ,  := range  {
		,  := .(fyne.Widget)
		if ! {
			continue
		}
		,  := renderers[]
		if ! {
			continue
		}
		.renderer.Destroy()
		overrides.Delete()
		delete(renderers, )
	}
	renderersLock.Unlock()
}

// CleanCanvases runs cache clean tasks for canvases that are being refreshed. This is called on paint events.
func ( []fyne.Canvas) {
	 := timeNow()

	// do not run clean task too fast
	if .Sub(lastClean) < 10*time.Second {
		return
	}

	if .Sub(lastClean) < cleanTaskInterval {
		return
	}

	destroyExpiredSvgs()
	destroyExpiredFontMetrics()

	 := make([]fyne.CanvasObject, 0, 50)

	canvasesLock.RLock()
	for ,  := range canvases {
		if .isExpired() && matchesACanvas(, ) {
			 = append(, )
		}
	}
	canvasesLock.RUnlock()
	if len() == 0 {
		return
	}

	canvasesLock.Lock()
	for ,  := range  {
		delete(canvases, )
	}
	canvasesLock.Unlock()

	renderersLock.Lock()
	for ,  := range  {
		,  := .(fyne.Widget)
		if ! {
			continue
		}
		,  := renderers[]
		if ! || !.isExpired() {
			continue
		}
		.renderer.Destroy()
		overrides.Delete()
		delete(renderers, )
	}
	renderersLock.Unlock()
	lastClean = timeNow()
}

// ResetThemeCaches clears all the svg and text size cache maps
func () {
	svgs.Range(func(,  any) bool {
		svgs.Delete()
		return true
	})

	fontSizeLock.Lock()
	fontSizeCache = map[fontSizeEntry]*fontMetric{}
	fontSizeLock.Unlock()
}

// destroyExpiredCanvases deletes objects from the canvases cache.
func ( time.Time) {
	canvasesLock.Lock()
	for ,  := range canvases {
		if .isExpired() {
			delete(canvases, )
		}
	}
	canvasesLock.Unlock()
}

// destroyExpiredRenderers deletes the renderer from the cache and calls
// renderer.Destroy()
func ( time.Time) {
	renderersLock.Lock()
	for ,  := range renderers {
		if .isExpired() {
			.renderer.Destroy()
			overrides.Delete()
			delete(renderers, )
		}
	}
	renderersLock.Unlock()
}

// matchesACanvas returns true if the canvas represented by the canvasInfo object matches one of
// the canvases passed in 'canvases', otherwise false is returned.
func ( *canvasInfo,  []fyne.Canvas) bool {
	 := .canvas

	for ,  := range  {
		if  ==  {
			return true
		}
	}
	return false
}

type expiringCache struct {
	expires atomic.Pointer[time.Time]
}

// isExpired check if the cache data is expired.
func ( *expiringCache) ( time.Time) bool {
	 := .expires.Load()
	if  == nil {
		return (time.Time{}).Before()
	}
	return (*).Before()
}

// setAlive updates expiration time.
func ( *expiringCache) () {
	 := timeNow().Add(cacheDuration)
	.expires.Store(&)
}

type expiringCacheNoLock struct {
	expires time.Time
}

// isExpired check if the cache data is expired.
func ( *expiringCacheNoLock) ( time.Time) bool {
	return .expires.Before()
}

// setAlive updates expiration time.
func ( *expiringCacheNoLock) () {
	 := timeNow().Add(cacheDuration)
	.expires = 
}
